name: Fruit Size Constraint
message: Apples must have a size of 50%

name: Bowl Movement Details Constraint
message: Bowl must move right with a speed of 10 when right arrow key is pressed.

name: Apple Falling Details
message: Apple must fall down in steps of size 5.

name: Apple Spawn Random X Position Constraint
Banana Spawn Random X Position Constraint
Banana Beginning Delay Constraint
message: Banana must be invisible for the first second.

name: Apple Points Constraint
message: Apples must give 5 points when they hit the bowl.

name: Banana Bowl Points Constraint
message: Banana bowl points could not be checked.

name: Banana Ground Points Constraint
message: Banana ground points could not be checked.

name: Banana Ground Message Constraint
message: Banana ground message could not be checked.

name: Timer Game Over Message Constraint
message: Bowl must display a message after 30 seconds.
